2. Turn “ON” the hemoglobinometer: 
In cuvette based hemoglobinometer
After the monitor shows three dashes, pull the cuvette holder in its loading position. Fill the 
microcuvette in one continuous process. The correct amount of blood (10 μl) is drawn into the 
microcuvette. The microcuvette should be completely filled. Wipe away any excess blood on the
